Room.Name: Eidenhoft Boulevard
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Eidenhoft Boulevard, northeast of the intersection between Eidenhoft, Rosecrest Street and Waterfront Way. A park is east.
Room.LongDescription: Because of Eidenhoft Boulevard's diagonal nature, small portions of the city block became unusable, notably the sections directly to the south and east of here. To make the area more aesthetically pleasing, the slivers of land were converted to small parks. There is a large intersection to the southwest where three roads come together.
